## PluginInfo Dataclass

Simple dataclass representing plugin information for display in the
workflow UI.

``` python
def PluginInfo(
    id:str, name:str, title:str, is_configured:bool, supports_streaming:bool=False
)->None:

```

*Information about a transcription plugin.*

## PluginRegistryProtocol

Protocol defining the interface for plugin registries that the workflow
can use to discover and manage transcription plugins.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

<a
href="https://github.com/cj-mills/cjm-fasthtml-workflow-transcription-single-file/blob/main/cjm_fasthtml_workflow_transcription_single_file/core/protocols.py#L24"
target="_blank" style="float:right; font-size:smaller">source</a>

### PluginRegistryProtocol

``` python

def PluginRegistryProtocol(
    args:VAR_POSITIONAL, kwargs:VAR_KEYWORD
):

```

*Protocol for plugin registry access.*
